## Core Features

::: {.columns}
::: {.column width="33%"}
### <i class="fas fa-chart-line"></i> Statistical Analysis

Perform rapid statistical and geostatistical analysis on drillhole data with built-in validation tools.
:::
::: {.column width="33%"}
### <i class="fas fa-cube"></i> 3D Visualization

Create interactive 3D plots and geological models to visualize your exploration data dynamically.
:::
::: {.column width="33%"}
### <i class="fas fa-check-circle"></i> Data Validation

Comprehensive QA/QC tools to ensure data quality and accuracy throughout your workflow.
:::
:::

## Project Roadmap

GeoDataViz is available as a full-featured local version and a live web demo. I'm now focused on future development for a Pro version.

::: {.columns}
::: {.column width="50%"}
#### Open Source Version (Current)

* Complete drillhole visualization
* Statistical analysis tools
* Interactive 3D plotting
* Data validation & QA/QC
:::
::: {.column width="50%"}
#### Advanced Features (Pro Version)

* Automated reporting system
* Resource estimation modules
* Pit optimization tools
* Advanced geostatistics
:::
:::

## About This Project

GeoDataViz emerged from a vision to promote **open-source solutions** in the geological community. This project is part of my advocacy for making powerful geological tools accessible to everyone. By integrating popular R packages, GeoDataViz aims to become the go-to *workbench* for geoscientists worldwide.
